description: Checks the user's membership in all requested groups and returns if the member exists in all queried groups.

parameters.name: IdentityStoreId
parameters.description: The globally unique identifier for the identity store.

parameters.name: MemberId
parameters.description: An object containing the identifier of a group member. UserId (string) --- An object containing the identifiers of resources that can be members.

nested_params.name: UserId
nested_params.description: An object containing the identifiers of resources that can be members.

parameters.name: GroupIds
parameters.description: A list of identifiers for groups in the identity store. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Results
nested_items.description: A list containing the results of membership existence checks.

nested_items.name: GroupId
nested_items.description: The identifier for a group in the identity store.

nested_items.name: UserId
nested_items.description: An object containing the identifiers of resources that can be members.

nested_items.name: MembershipExists
nested_items.description: Indicates whether a membership relation exists or not.
